/* baseCode.selectBaseCodeDetail 기초코드 조회 */
SELECT CD.BaseCodeID , CD.CompanyCode , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('CompanyCode', CD.CompanyCode, CD.CompanyCode) AS CompanyName , CD.CodeGroup , CASE WHEN CD.IsGroup = 'Y' THEN CD.CodeName ELSE GrpCD.CodeName END AS CodeGroupName , CD.Code , CD.SortKey , CD.IsUse , CD.CodeName , CD.Reserved1 , CD.Reserved2 , CD.Reserved3 , CD.Reserved4 , CD.ReservedInt , CD.ReservedFloat , CD.Description , CD.ModifierID , CD.ModifierID AS ModifierName , CD.IsGroup , DATE_FORMAT(CD.ModifyDate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS ModifyDate , DATE_FORMAT(CD.RegistDate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS RegistDate FROM covi_account4j_si.act_base_code CD LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_base_code GrpCD ON GrpCd.IsGroup = 'Y' AND GrpCD.Code = Cd.CodeGroup AND GrpCD.CompanyCode = CD.CompanyCode WHERE 1=1 AND CD.BaseCodeID = #{BaseCodeID}
SELECT MAX(SortKey) FROM covi_account4j_si.act_base_code WHERE CodeGroup = 'IOCode' AND IsUse = 'Y' AND IsGroup = 'N'
SELECT A.CompanyCode FROM covi_account4j_si.act_base_code A INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain B ON A.CompanyCode = B.DomainCode WHERE A.CodeGroup = 'CompanyCode' AND B.DomainID = #{DomainID}

SELECT DISTINCT B.DomainID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_base_code A INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain B
ON B.DomainCode = 'ORGROOT'
ON B.DomainCode = A.CompanyCode
WHERE A.CodeGroup = 'CompanyCode' AND A.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}
